name: JOBU-KI
description: Endless runner full of color and weird creatures. Just some fun and funny little game ready to waste some of your time!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 480 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 660 Storage: 400 MB available space
